WorkItem.Description:
I was using YUI minifier, and everything was working fine. All files being minified automatically got checked out from TFS both with source file.

But I realized, that offline Google Closure compiler performs better, I saved almost 100KB in result size. But, unfortunately - when I use it, it some why doesn't check out minified files.
WorkItem.Summary: Minified file is not checked out from TFS with offline  Google Closure
